hints.title: Mean-Field Cloning Entropy Dissipation
hints.content:
95: :label: lem-meanfield-cloning-dissipation-hybrid
96: 
97: **Hypotheses**:
98: 
99: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
100: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave: $\rho_\pi = e^{-V_{\text{QSD}}}$ for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
101: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator
102: 4. Fitness-QSD anti-correlation: $\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$ with $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
103: 5. Regularity: $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$ and $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
104: 6. Noise regime: $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$
105: 
106: **Conclusion**:
107: 
108: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
109: 
110: $$
111: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
112: $$
113: 
114: where:
115: $$
116: \beta_{\text{clone}} := \frac{\lambda_{\text{clone}}}{m_a} \lambda_{\text{corr}} \lambda_{\text{Poin}} (1 - \epsilon_{\text{ratio}}) > 0
117: $$
118: 
119: and:
120: $$
121: C_{\text{ent}} := \tau \lambda_{\text{clone}} \left[\log\left(\frac{\rho_{\max}}{\rho_{\min}}\right) - \frac{d}{2} \log(2\pi e \delta^2)\right] < 0

92: This is the **new contribution** of the mean-field approach. We prove:
93: 
94: :::{prf:lemma} Mean-Field Cloning Entropy Dissipation
95: :label: lem-meanfield-cloning-dissipation-hybrid
96: 
97: **Hypotheses**:
98: 
99: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
100: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave: $\rho_\pi = e^{-V_{\text{QSD}}}$ for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
101: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator
102: 4. Fitness-QSD anti-correlation: $\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$ with $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
103: 5. Regularity: $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$ and $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
104: 6. Noise regime: $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$
105: 
106: **Conclusion**:
107: 
108: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
109: 
110: $$
111: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
112: $$
113: 
114: where:
115: $$
116: \beta_{\text{clone}} := \frac{\lambda_{\text{clone}}}{m_a} \lambda_{\text{corr}} \lambda_{\text{Poin}} (1 - \epsilon_{\text{ratio}}) > 0
117: $$
118: 
119: and:
120: $$
121: C_{\text{ent}} := \tau \lambda_{\text{clone}} \left[\log\left(\frac{\rho_{\max}}{\rho_{\min}}\right) - \frac{d}{2} \log(2\pi e \delta^2)\right] < 0
122: $$
